self.name: messages.sendInlineBotResult
self.descriptionExcerpt: Send a result obtained using messages.getInlineBotResults.

arguments.name: silent
arguments.description: Whether to send the message silently (no notification will be triggered on the other client)

arguments.name: background
arguments.description: Whether to send the message in background

arguments.name: hideVia
arguments.description: Whether to hide the via @botname in the resulting message (only for bot usernames encountered in the config)

arguments.name: replyToMsgId
arguments.description: ID of the message this message should reply to

arguments.name: randomId
arguments.description: Random ID to avoid resending the same query

throws.description: The provided channel is invalid
throws.name: CHANNEL_INVALID

throws.description: You haven't joined this channel/supergroup
throws.name: CHANNEL_PRIVATE

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: You can't send messages in this chat, you were restricted
throws.name: CHAT_RESTRICTED

throws.description: You can't send gifs in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_SEND_GIFS_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: You can't send inline messages in this group
throws.name: CHAT_SEND_INLINE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: You can't send media in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_SEND_MEDIA_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: You can't send stickers in this chat.
throws.name: CHAT_SEND_STICKERS_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The inline query expired
throws.name: INLINE_RESULT_EXPIRED

throws.description: The specified user was deleted
throws.name: INPUT_USER_DEACTIVATED

throws.description: The provided media object is invalid
throws.name: MEDIA_EMPTY

throws.description: Invalid message ID provided
throws.name: MSG_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The query ID is empty
throws.name: QUERY_ID_EMPTY

throws.description: Result ID empty
throws.name: RESULT_ID_EMPTY

throws.description: Slowmode is enabled in this chat: you must wait for the specified number of seconds before sending another message to the chat.
throws.name: SLOWMODE_WAIT_X

throws.description: You're banned from sending messages in supergroups/channels
throws.name: USER_BANNED_IN_CHANNEL

throws.description: Failure while fetching the webpage with cURL
throws.name: WEBPAGE_CURL_FAILED

throws.description: Webpage media empty
throws.name: WEBPAGE_MEDIA_EMPTY

throws.description: You blocked this user
throws.name: YOU_BLOCKED_USER
